title: Mysterious Magic Shop
narrative: You stumble upon a small shop tucked away in a narrow alley. The sign reads 'Arcane Curiosities' and the windows are filled with glowing crystals, strange herbs, and books with moving covers. An elderly wizard eyes you suspiciously from behind the counter.

choices.text: Ask about the most powerful item in the shop
Try to haggle for a cheaper price on a simple potion
Attempt to steal a small crystal when the wizard isn't looking
